about.title: Ruby Wu
about.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer
about.professional_summary_text: Senior Frontend Architect and AI Solutions Specialist with 7 years of experience designing and implementing high-performance, scalable B2B enterprise solutions. Proven expertise in frontend engineering, performance optimization, and team leadership. A passionate innovator in AI-driven development, specializing in "Low-Code + LLM + AI Agent" solutions. Successfully built intelligent workflows using Dify, RAG, and MCP technologies to automate processes, enhance risk control, and reduce operational costs.
about.position_title: Senior Frontend Engineer / AI Solutions Architect
about.project_micro_frontend_1: Architected and led the 0-to-1 development of a large-scale enterprise cloud platform using a Wujie-based micro-frontend architecture
about.project_micro_frontend_2: Successfully integrated over 12 subsystems, ensuring stable and high-performance operation for 1,000+ DAU and tens of thousands of total users
about.project_micro_frontend_3: Resolved critical pain points of the original monolithic application, including code-base bloat, inefficient team collaboration, and difficulties in technology upgrades
about.project_component_library_1: Spearheaded the design and implementation of an enterprise-grade Monorepo (Turborepo), centralizing 3 core packages and 2 applications
about.project_component_library_2: Significantly improved team development efficiency and reduced cross-project maintenance costs
about.project_component_library_3: Implemented Changeset for automated version management, changelog generation, and npm publishing
about.project_component_library_4: Established a complete CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, automating the entire workflow from development to deployment
about.project_ai_automation_1: Built and championed a low-code AI solution stack (N8n, LLMs, AI Agents, MCP) for secure, on-premise workflow automation
about.project_ai_automation_2: Led the development of an internal intelligent Q&A system using Dify, providing instant, knowledge-base-aware responses
about.project_ai_automation_3: Applied advanced RAG techniques by vectorizing documents into a vector database, dynamically feeding relevant context to LLMs
about.project_ai_automation_4: Engineered AI Agents to understand complex user intent and automate multi-step, cross-system business processes
about.project_ai_development_1: Pioneered a high-efficiency workflow (Cursor + Figma + MCP), drastically reducing the design-to-delivery cycle
about.project_ai_development_2: Leveraged AI-powered coding tools and advanced prompt engineering to enhance development speed and code quality
about.project_ai_deployment_1: Designed an automated transaction monitoring workflow for risk control with real-time anomaly detection and alerts
about.project_ai_deployment_2: Developed an intelligent voice assistant to automate customer intake and data submission, providing 24/7 service
about.project_ai_deployment_3: Automated repetitive tasks including financial reconciliation and report generation, integrating with core business systems
about.project_realtime_communication_1: Developed a full-stack real-time chat and co-browsing system, extending an existing screen-sharing service
about.project_realtime_communication_2: Built the backend using Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO for real-time events, with Sequelize (MySQL) for persistence and Redis for session caching
about.project_realtime_communication_3: Ensured high availability and concurrency handling by deploying the Node.js application in cluster mode using PM2
about.project_monitoring_sdk_1: Developed a custom in-house frontend monitoring SDK for error tracking and performance analysis
about.project_monitoring_sdk_2: Implemented non-intrusive logging using Babel for automated code instrumentation
about.project_monitoring_sdk_3: Integrated user behavior analytics, including session recording/replay and heatmaps
